titles.title: Puerto Rican Source Tax Fairness Act
To clarify that retirement income from pension plans of the government of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico shall be exempt from nonresident taxation in the same manner as State pension plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Puerto Rican Source Tax Fairness Act - Amends specified Federal law (relating to limitations on State income taxation of certain pension income) to provide that retirement income from pension plans of the government of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico shall be exempt from nonresident taxation by the Commonwealth in the same manner as State pension plans are exempt from State income taxation.
